channel.title: Please look/ i really need help
channel.description:
Hello, :) I gotta vps and installed jdk, added the classpath i complied it and than clicked run.bat and i got this
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
My run.bat code is @echo off title rsvpdelta java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server pause
Witch nothing looks messed up their. im going to be gone for like 4 hours. so leave me ur msn or just help her thanks. Bryan

item.title: Please look/ i really need help
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

You configured the classpath incorrectly.

Read full topic

item.title: Please look/ i really need help
item.dc:creator: @dragonman2 dragonman2
item.description:
@dragonman2 wrote:

Hello,
I gotta vps and installed jdk, added the classpath i complied it and than clicked run.bat and i got this

‘java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue . . .

My run.bat code is @echo off
title rsvpdelta
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
pause

Witch nothing looks messed up their. im going to be gone for like 4 hours. so leave me ur msn or just help her thanks.
Bryan
